attributes.action: help classic cars to be converted into electric vehicles
attributes.additional_details: With the abolition of E5 fuel and the introduction of E10 classic car owners have to pay a premium on fuel or risk having the fuel cause blockages or corrode vital parts of the engine.
attributes.background: Provide a partial government grant or scheme to financially assist classic car owners to have their vehicles be converted into fully electric vehicles, providing this would help the government pledge to have 0 net emissions by 2050 and support various British businesses.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580340
